Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Sarabande und Chaconne aus dem Singspiel Almira, S. 181

1879 · LW A290 · R. 25

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

This is based on the sarabande and chaconne from George Frideric Handel’s opera Almira (HWV 1).

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · II/14 · Z. A/B 12403 · Free Arrangements XIV · ed. Géza Gémesi / Imre Mező / Imre Sulyok

Duration: 11' 30"

Difficulty: 4
